name: Space Drifter (almat)
description:
In Space Drifter you have to manage to survive with a semi-working ship  while trying to get the best score you can !

Your ship engine works only a few seconds then it burst only for you to repair it fast before you hit an asteroid but be careful when the engine starts again your ship will go faster an instant !

This game works only with a controller.

It is my first ever released game project I had a lot fun while making it. There is a lot that I want to add but couldn't maybe one day I will come back to it , who knows .

Hope you enjoy it !
